Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !grab
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !grab [character]
EXAMPLE: !grab Launfal
Teleports a character to your current location, which should typically be the Skotos Office or some other official place. This should only be done with a character's permission or in an extreme case and should be considered more disruptive than simply talking to a character via pages. After you have finished talking to a character you can return them to their previous locale with the !ungrab command.
SEE ALSO: !join, !office, !page, !ungrab
